title: Privincial Councillor dies in motorbike accident
content:
A SLFP councillor of the Bingiriya Pradeshiya Sabha of the Kurunegala District who was riding a motorbike without a helmet died in an accident yesterday (24).
The dead councillor has been identified as I.P. Amila Kumara (37) died on the spot after crashing into a lamp post along the Dummalasooriya â€“ Bingiriya main road after travelling at break-neck speed.
The post mortem examination was to be held at Kuliyapitiya Teaching Hospital yesterday (25). Investigations are being conducted under the directions of Bingiriya Police OIC IP Harisson Somasiri.
